Event.Connection.Error.message: 连接到 API 时出错。

Event.Connection.Disconnected.message: 已断开与 API 连接。

Event.Connection.Ratelimited.message: 由于 API 限制速率，将在稍后自动重试。

State.Connected.Description.message: 目前有 {0} 个已连接的客户端。

State.Unknown.Description.message: 我们不能确定在这里发生了什么。

State.MaxClients.message: 服务器支持一次连接 {0} 个客户端。

Window.Dropdown.Options.Status.Tooltip.message:
查看此 API 实例的状态页面。
({0})

Window.Dropdown.Options.Support.Tooltip.message: 支持开发者和 API 实例主机。

Window.Dropdown.Settings.RestartRequired.message: 需要重新启动插件来应用某些配置更改。

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreFC.Toolti.message: Whether or not to ignore friend notifications from players in your Free Company, may not work inside of instances or worlds other than your homeworld.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreDiffHomew.message: Whether or not to ignore friend notifications from player characters who have a different homeworld than you.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreDiffWorld.message: Whether or not to ignore friend notifications from players currently in different worlds than you.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreDiffTerri.message: Whether or not to ignore friend notifications from players currently in different zones.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.IgnoreDiffDatac.message: Whether or not to ignore friend notifications from players currently on different datacenters.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.NotificationTyp.message: The type of notification to show when a friend event occurs.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.LoginMessage.To.message:
The message to show when a friend logs in.
Message must contain {0} at least once to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.InvalidLoginMes.message: The login message must contain {0} at least once to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.LogoutMessage.T.message:
The message to show when a friend logs out.
Message must contain {0} at least once to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.InvalidLogoutMe.message: The logout message must contain {0} at least once to insert the friend's name.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APINotification.message: Whether or not to notifications when the API connection status changes, this is not related to friend notifications.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.FriendshipCode..message:
Your friendship code limits who you send notifications to.
You will only send and receive notifications with people who have the same code.

Leave empty for the best experience.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APIUrl.Tooltip.message: The URL of the API instance to connect to. You should trust the host of this instance before connecting to it.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APIUrlInvalid.message: The API URL is invalid, please double check it contains the protocol (http:// or https://) and the port (if applicable).

Window.Dropdown.Settings.APIToken.Toolti.message:
Sets the 'Authorization' header value to send with all requests to the API.
You will need to include the authorization scheme (eg. bearer, basic) before the value.
The API instance will be able to see this value, never set it to sensitive information like your login password.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.SaltMethod.Tool.message:
Strict: Validation is done using both Friend Code & Plugin Manifest (Users must be using the same plugin, version & build to exchange events)
Relaxed: Validation is only done using Friend Code (Users can exchange events from any source using the same API)

Keep this on strict unless you have reason to change it.

Window.Dropdown.Settings.FriendslistCach.message:
Whether or not to cache the friends list to show notifications when it is unavailable (eg. inside of instanced content).
Disable to not show notifications when the friends list is unavailable.

Note: When enabling this setting, the cache will not be updated until the next time the friends list is available.

Window.Dropdown.Support.FlavourText.message: You can find ways to support either the plugin developer or API host here. Any support is greatly appreciated!

Window.Dropdown.Support.Developer.Descri.message: The developer is responsible for the code that makes the Plugin and API work.

Window.Dropdown.Support.APIHost.Descript.message: The API instance host is responsible for running and maintaining the server that this plugin is connected to.

Window.Dropdown.Support.APIHost.InvalidU.message: The API instance host has provided an invalid support URL.

Window.Dropdown.Logs.FilterTooltip.message: Set the selected log level, any logs below this level will be hidden.

Window.URLUpdateNag.Text.message:
Your configured instance is recommending that you update to a new API URL; this is likely due to a change in the instance's domain name or hosting provider.

If you trust the new URL({0}), press the button below to update the API URL for next plugin load. Otherwise, you may want to find another instance provider.

Hold shift or wait {1} seconds to select an option.
